attributes.action: NEVER allow hardcore pornography to be available on T.V.; even by paid subscription
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some people may see the "right" to view this as a personal choice; what about the personal choice of women not to be raped, or suffer even worse sexual assaults, as the result of men's "personal choice" to view it?  Pornography portrays the women involved in it, and by extension all women, as sex objects; i.e. objects to be used for sex in the same way that I'm currently using my computer to create this petition.  Such a way of portraying women (or anyone) depersonalises them so that it becomes more acceptable to treat them in ways you would never do if you saw them as human beings like yourself.  

In the 30s the notorious paper Die Sturmer portrayed Jews (and probably other people the Nazis considered sub-human) in ways that made ordinary Germans see them not as fellow humans but as THINGS, almost, that you could treat as you wanted; this almost certainly led to the general support of the "Final Solution"/Holocaust.  In my opinion porn, especially hard-core, could be said to have a similar effect on people's perception of women.
